data.name: Oculus 360 Photos
data.description:
Starting June 15th 2023, Oculus 360 Photos will no longer be available on the Oculus Go Store.

The official 360 Photos app from Oculus will take you on a tour of amazing sights from around the world. View VR panoramas of breathtaking landscapes, ancient landmarks, dazzling cityscapes, underwater vistas, and much more.

translations.long_description: Oculus의 공식 360 Photos 앱을 통해 전 세계의 놀라운 풍경 안으로 직접 빠져들어 보세요. 경이로운 자연 풍경과 고대 유적지, 눈부신 도시 경관, 화려한 물속 풍경 등을 가상 현실 파노라마로 감상할 수 있습니다.
translations.short_description: Take a virtual reality tour of breathtaking landscapes, ancient landmarks, dazzling cityscapes, and more.

translations.long_description: Die offizielle 360 Photos-App von Oculus nimmt dich mit auf eine eindrucksvolle Reise zu Sehenswürdigkeiten rund um die Welt. Sieh dir VR-Panoramabilder von atemberaubenden Landschaften, antiken Wahrzeichen, unglaublichen Städten, schönen Unterwasserwelten und vielem mehr an.
translations.short_description: Take a virtual reality tour of breathtaking landscapes, ancient landmarks, dazzling cityscapes, and more.

translations.long_description: Con la aplicación oficial 360 Photos de Oculus podrás hacer un recorrido por lugares increíbles de todo el mundo. Disfruta de asombrosos panoramas en realidad virtual, sitios históricos, paisajes urbanos deslumbrantes, vistas submarinas y mucho más.
translations.short_description: Take a virtual reality tour of breathtaking landscapes, ancient landmarks, dazzling cityscapes, and more.

translations.long_description: L'applicazione ufficiale 360 Photos di Oculus ti consentirà di fare il giro del mondo alla scoperta di magnifici panorami. Guarda le immagaini in realtà virtuale di paesaggi mozzafiato, antichi insediamenti, scorci di città stupefacenti, spettacoli sottomarini e molto altro.
translations.short_description: Take a virtual reality tour of breathtaking landscapes, ancient landmarks, dazzling cityscapes, and more.

translations.long_description: Con la aplicación oficial 360 Photos de Oculus podrás hacer un recorrido por lugares impresionantes de alrededor del planeta. Disfruta de panoramas en realidad virtual que quitan el aliento, sitios históricos, asombrosos paisajes urbanos, imágenes submarinas y mucho más.
translations.short_description: Take a virtual reality tour of breathtaking landscapes, ancient landmarks, dazzling cityscapes, and more.

translations.long_description: L’application officielle 360 Photos d’Oculus vous fera visiter le monde entier avec des vues extraordinaires. Admirez des panoramas en réalité virtuelle : superbes paysages, sites antiques, horizons urbains vertigineux, vues sous-marines et bien plus encore.
translations.short_description: Take a virtual reality tour of breathtaking landscapes, ancient landmarks, dazzling cityscapes, and more.
